notesStmt.note: A translation of: Traité des feux artificiels pour la guerre, et pour la recreation.
With an additional title page, engraved, "A treatise: of artificiall fireworkes by F. Malthus", signed: T. Cecill sc: [?fe:].
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Variant: engraving on C7v also printed on C5v; mistake rectified by a cancel pasted onto C5v.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
